Who paves and repairs neighborhood roads? How can you get speedbumps in neighborhoods with heavy threw traffic?



I know that a local news channel has been taking an inventory of potholes in Wilmington. I have taken some pictures of some very large potholes in neighborhoods around town. However, I was wondering who would have to be responsible for fixing them when they are in residential areas?
